message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.CL

The paper deals with data augmentation techniques for computer vision tasks, which is a common topic in the computer vision (cs.CV) sub-category. Additionally, the paper proposes a method for automatically learning task-specific augmentations, which involves machine learning techniques and falls under the sub-categories of machine learning (cs.LG), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), and neural and evolutionary computing (cs.NE). Finally, the paper also mentions using safe augmentations for image segmentation, which is a topic in the natural language processing and computational linguistics (cs.CL) sub-category.
